desc:
BSH Walls and Floors is a well-known name in the flooring industry for more than 20 years. We are the largest
supplier of carpet tiles in Riyadh, Jeddah and across KSA with a stocking capacity of 140,000 sqft. So, either it's
your meeting room or VIP lounge, reception or open office, waiting area, or a corridor, we offer you the right flooring solution for the right place within your budget.
